Denton See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4286.htm
Band Contest - Denton A Brass Band Contest took place at Denton, near Manchester, and most of the celebrated bands from Yorkshire and Lancashire competed. Although we cannot congratulate the Matlock band on having achieved complete success, it is still highly gratifying to find that it is superior to such bands as Dewsbury, SaItaire, and other first-class bands. The prizes were awarded as follows: 1st Prize, £20, and tenor horn, Bacup; 2nd prize; £14, Matlock;. 3rd prize, £8, Dewsbury; 4th prize, £5. Saltaire; 6th prize, £3, Healy Hall (Rochdale). Three other bands were unsuccessful,
Sept. 27, 2011, 11:23 a.m. June 9, 2012, 10:52 a.m.
1 Bacup Old John Lord
2 Matlock Band Unknown
3 Dewsbury Band Unknown
